name: Wolfstreet
description:
Wolfstreet is a creative agency that effectively combines ideation, creation and production. Our flexible and talented team has the power to develop strong ideas and turn them into reality. This entails that we execute film and production work, but also develop concepts in-house.
We believe that the force behind Wolfstreet is the team of hungry young creatives. Combining Amsterdam’s finest strategists, creatives, producers and directors gives us the opportunity to flourish. It’s of utmost importance to continuously meet new talent who are eager to show off their skills.
